question: A carpenter works for 5 weeks every month and for 4 days every week. If he gets paid $75 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The carpenter works for 4 days every week and works for 5 weeks every month so he works for 4 days/week * 5 weeks/month = <<4*5=20>>20 days/month
If he earns $75 every day he then earns $75/day * 20 days/month = $<<75*20=1500>>1500/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $1500/month * 12 months/year = $<<1500*12=18,000>>18,000
#### 18,000
